parameters.componentSubtitle: The inevitable HTML table, with special case cells

description.component: You can create a Bulma table simply by attaching a single table CSS class on a `<table>` HTML element with the following structure: `<table class='table'>` as the main container, `thead` the optional top part of the table, `tfoot` the optional bottom part of the table, `tbody` the main content of the table, `tr` each table row, `th` a table cell heading and `td` a table cell.
